About

I’m RNGDES. A 29 year old designer by day and a twitch streamer by night hailing from of Philadelphia. Streaming a whole ton of Path of Exile. Feel free to drop a follow and stop in when I’m live and say hello. I love meeting new streameres and helping out however I can.

Currently Playing:

  • Path of Exile

How do I request overlays for certain games?

I’d recommend reaching out to me via Twitter or email. I’ll do my best to respond as quickly as possible, balancing a full time job and freelance along the way gets tough sometimes. Thanks in advance for your patience.
